original_text: They came out with all their troops and a large number of horses and chariots—a huge army, as numerous as the sand on the seashore.
korean_text: 그들이 그 모든 군대를 거느리고 나왔으니 백성이 많아 해변의 수많은 모래 같고 말과 병거도 심히 많았으며

sentences.original_text: They came out with all their troops
and a large number of horses and chariots
as numerous as the sand on the seashore
